Description: Uprooted / Fallen Tree - 1 house incurred minimal damage at Sitio Guru-an
caused total damage to a house owned by Ms. Juvylee Talaron and partial damage to a house owned by Mrs. Sandy Jimenez
Actions Taken: PDRRMO Guimaras conducted site assessment and assisted affected families. Affected families were evacuated to identified evacuation area in the barangay. Representatives from MGB VI went to the site to assess the area. Residents were advised to go back to their houses since the soil is still wet.
